show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Is there a supplement in your medicine cabinet that treats Ebola? <!--more--> A secret ancient natural remedy that prevents and treats gum disease.
If you have cancer, what can you do to help shrink your tumor?
The danger of gaining just five pounds.
Can cleaning your hands lead to a dreaded disease?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips are: Do you need motivation to help you exercise?
Don’t take anything for granted!
